channel.title: MySQL integration <- Guide anywhere :S?
channel.description: I'm looking for a MySQL integration I'v googled but I don't fully understand what i'm looking for exactly Lol any ideas where I can find a nice guide :)? Its for a Delta Source? <- Don't know if that helps? 317

item.title: MySQL integration <- Guide anywhere :S?
item.dc:creator: @Pouch Pouch
item.description:
@Pouch wrote:

set up tables in ur MYSQL

make it check from Server.java
there is a download for SQL connections
then do the rest on yer own.
also make all connections connect to the SQL table.
